citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:40am on
Tuesday, April 22, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone
number listed on the account. A message was left. The inspector then waited approximately 45 minutes before leaving.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:40am on 
Tuesday, April 22, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone 
number listed on the account. A message was left. The inspector then waited approximately 45 minutes before leaving. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
